mapper.select: select cp.crtf_pay_no ,e.emp_no ,e.emp_name ,cp.work_y ,cp.pay_day ,cp.total_pay ,cp.salary ,cp.meals ,cp.no_bnf ,cp.np ,cp.nhi ,cp.nei ,cp.niai ,cp.work_m ,d.dept_name ,get_common_code_name('100', e.position_code) AS position_name FROM crtf_pay cp, employee e INNER JOIN dept d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo} ORDER BY crtf_pay_no desc

select TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || #{empNo} || seq_crtf_emp.nextval from dual
insert into crtf_emp( crtf_emp_no ,emp_no ,emp_name ,emp_rrn ,addr ,dept_name ,position_name ,join_day ,use_place ,crtf_emp_date ) select #{crtfEmpNo} ,#{empNo} ,e.emp_name ,e.emp_rrn ,e.emp_Addr1 || ' ' || e.emp_Addr2 as addr ,d.dept_name ,get_common_code_name('100', e.position_code) AS position_name ,(SUBSTR(e.join_day, 1, 4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(e.join_day, 5, 2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(e.join_day, 7, 2) || '일' || ' ~ ' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) || '일') as join_day ,#{usePlace} ,sysdate FROM employee e INNER JOIN dept d ON e.dept_code = d.dept_code WHERE e.emp_no = #{empNo}
mapper.select: select ce.crtf_emp_no ,e.emp_no ,e.emp_name ,(SUBSTR(ce.emp_rrn, 1, 6) || '-' || SUBSTR(ce.emp_rrn, 7, 7)) as emp_rrn ,ce.addr ,ce.dept_name ,ce.position_name ,ce.join_day ,ce.use_place ,ce.crtf_emp_date ,(SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ce.crtf_emp_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 1, 4) || '년 ' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ce.crtf_emp_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 5, 2) || '월 ' || SUBSTR(TO_CHAR(ce.crtf_emp_date, 'YYYYMMDD'), 7, 2) || '일') as crtf_emp_doc_date from crtf_emp ce, employee e where 1=1 and ce.emp_no = e.emp_no and ce.emp_no = #{empNo} order by crtf_emp_no desc
